title: Valves - Face, Guide and Stem - Inspection

body.body: Valves - Face, Guide and Stem - Inspection
A Titanium Nitride coating on the valve face provides protection from heat and carbon build up.
Grinding or lapping of the valve removes the coating which would damage the valve and cylinder head.
A damaged valve and or cylinder head may cause irreparable damage to the motorcycle engine.
Remove any carbon build-up from the valve head area. Examine the valve seat face, checking in particular for signs of cracking or pitting.
If a valve stem is found to be worn beyond the service limit, the valve must be renewed.
If a valve guide is found to be worn beyond the service limit, the complete cylinder head must be renewed.
